V05prmosufu:0_0_0: (PrMoSū_Mū-LCh)Pār.2 yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ
V05prmosufu:0_0_1: steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād
V05prmosufu:0_0_2: vā badhnīyād vā pravāsayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa bālo 'si mūḍho 'si
V05prmosufu:0_0_3: steyo 'sīty evaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣur adattaṃ ādadāvaḥ ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastaṃ saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayec
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_1: chastraṃ vainam ādhārayec chastrādhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_2: maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayed evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhaṃ bhoḥ puruṣo kiṃ te anena pāpakenāśucinā
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_3: durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bhoḥ puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_4: anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet sa ca
V05prmosufu:par.3_0_5: tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:par.4_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam.
V05prmosufu:par.4_1_0: ... viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ
V05prmosufu:par.4_1_1: paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣy
V05prmosufu:par.4_1_2: evaṃ vaded ajānaty evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyann evā .
V05prmosufu:par.4_2: .. ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:3_0_0: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim
V05prmosufu:3_0_1: adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ tathāpaścāt
V05prmosufu:4_1: .. dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi
V05prmosufu:5_0: Uddāna SA.4-13: ... caryā sāṃcaritraṃ kuṭikā mahallakaḥ amūlaka leśika saṃghabhedas tasyānuvarti kuladūṣaka daurvacasya .
V05prmosufu:6_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
V05prmosufu:sa.2_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhu .
V05prmosufu:pay.33_0: pāyantikā // dvau trīn vā pātrapūrān pratigṛhya bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvibhaktavyā ātmanā ca paribhoktavyaṃ ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.34_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavān pravāritaḥ akṛtaniriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.35_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ pravāritam akṛta atiriktena khādanīyabhojanīyenātyarthaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.35_0_1: pravārayed idam āyuṣmaṃ khāda idaṃ bhuṃkṣva ity āsādanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur
V05prmosufu:pay.35_0_2: āsādito bhaviṣyaty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.36_1: / tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ : glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo 'dhvasamayo nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaḥ śramaṇabhaktam ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.37_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.38_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuṃjīta vā pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.39_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur adattaṃ mukhābhyavahāryam āhāram āhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhāt pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.40_0: yāni tāni bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇītabhojanāny akhyātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyo māṃsavallūrā /
V05prmosufu:pay.40_1: / yaḥ punar bhikṣur imāny evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāny ātmārtham aglānaḥ parakulebhyo vijñāpya khāded bhuṃjītā vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.41-50_0: uddānaṃ // saprāṇabhojane sthānaṃ niṣadyācela senayā dvirātraudyūṣikāṃ gacchet prahārodgūra duṣṭhulāḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.41_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.42_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule anupraskadyāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.43_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule rahasi praticchanne 'titiṣṭhet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.44_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakāya vā acelikāyai vā parivrājakāya vā parivrājikāyai vāstamāstaṃ ? khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.45_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.46_0: syāt khalu bhikṣoḥ tadrūpaḥ pratyaya udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravaset pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.47_0: dvirātram api ced bhikṣus tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravasann udyūṣikāṃ vā gacched dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūham anīkasaṃdarśanaṃ vā pratyanubhavet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.48_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.49_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāram udgūrayed antatas talaśaktikā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.50_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣor duṣṭhūlām āpattiṃ praticchādayet pāyantikā // //
V05prmosufu:28_0: uddānaṃ sparśo jyotiś chando 'nupasaṃpādanena dharmavādī ca śramaṇoddeśo daurvarṇyaṃ ratnaparidāhasamayaś ca /
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣman kulāny upasaṃkramiṣyāvaḥ tatra te
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_1: dāpayiṣyāmi praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvad āpta sa tasyādāpayitvā tataḥ paścād
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_2: eva vaded gaccha tvam āyuṣman na cet tvayā sārdhaṃ sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_3: vā api tv ekākina eva me sparśo bhavati kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā ity udyojanaprekṣī
V05prmosufu:pay.51_0_4: kaścid eṣa bhikṣur udyojito bhaviṣyatīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.52_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ātmārtham aglāno vitapanaprekṣī jyotiḥ samavadadhyāt samavadhāpayed vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.53_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmike saṃghakaraṇīye bhikṣoś chandaṃ datvā paścād abhiṣaktaḥ
V05prmosufu:pay.53_0_1: kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nāttamanāḥ kṣepadharmam āpadyeta āhara bhikṣo cchandaṃ na te dadāmīti
V05prmosufu:pay.54_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ dvirātrād ūrdhvaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ prakalpayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_1: āntarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tenāpratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti sa bhikṣur
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_2: bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_3: deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_4: antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣu na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_5: ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇāyuṣmann āntarāyikā dharmāḥ santa āntarāyikā
V05prmosufu:pay.55_0_6: evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti /
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_0: / niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_1: ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_2: trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api
V05prmosufu:pay.55_1_3: trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.56_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam apratiniḥsṛṣṭe tasmin
V05prmosufu:pay.56_0_1: pāpake dṛṣṭigate ālapet saṃlapet saṃvaset saṃbhuṃjīta tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_0: śramaṇoddeśaś cāpy evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_1: āntarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā tena pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti sa śramaṇoddeśo
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_2: bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_3: bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye āntarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā pratisevyamānā
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_4: nālam antarāyāyeti mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣu na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_0_5: na ca punar bhagavān evam āha anekaparyāyeṇa ya .
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_0: .. āntarāyikāḥ kāmāḥ santa āntarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā alam
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_1: antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_2: evaṃ cet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_3: no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_4: pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamāṇas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_5: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_6: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa nāsau bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_7: śāstā vyapadeṣṭavyo nāpy anyatamānyatamo vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī pṛṣṭhataḥ
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_8: pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhavyo yad apy anye śramaṇoddeśā labhante kaścid asya bhikṣor
V05prmosufu:pay.57_1_9: muhūrtam apy asparśo bhaviṣyatīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.57_2: {on p. 7 = FE 10.3-7, 9.1-3 again parts of Pāy. 57, differs from labhante onwards:
V05prmosufu:pay.57_3: } labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dvirātraparamaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te 'dyāgreṇa nāsti cara pareṇa mohapuruṣa naśya tvaṃ /
V05prmosufu:pay.57_4: / yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed upalāḍayet tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.58_0_0: na ca cīvarapratilambhād bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamad durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.58_0_1: nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kaṣāyaṃ vā anādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaḥ
V05prmosufu:pay.58_0_2: durvarṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kaṣāyaṃ vā navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.59_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vā anyatrādhyārāmagatād vā adhyāvāsagatād vā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.65_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.66_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vā anantato hāsyaprekṣy api pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.67_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā śikṣamāṇāyā vā śrāmaṇerakasya vā śrāmaṇerikāyā
V05prmosufu:pay.67_0_1: vā pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā śikyaṃ vā saritaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā
V05prmosufu:pay.67_0_2: śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayed vānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt
V05prmosufu:pay.68_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaram vā datvā tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.69_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭo dveṣād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpannam amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.70_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur apuruṣayā striyā sārdham adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:47_0: uddānam* // steyonaviṃśati khanet pravāraṇā śikṣitavyaṃ kalahānāṃ tūṣṇīṃ viprakrāmed anādarāt surāpānam akāle ca /
V05prmosufu:pay.71_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdham adhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.72_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśativarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāyopasaṃpādayet pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.72_1: / sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.73_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanet khānayed vā pāyantikā //
V05prmosufu:pay.74_0: cāturmāsikī bhikṣuṇā pravāraṇā svīkartavyā anyatra samayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.74_1: / tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ pratyekapratyekapravāraṇā punaḥ punaḥ pravāraṇā atyarthapravāraṇā nityapravāraṇā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.75_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamāno syāt te āyuṣmaṃ cchikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sa evaṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.75_0_1: vaden nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bālānāṃ mūḍhānām avyaktānām akuśalānāṃ vacanenāsyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ
V05prmosufu:pay.75_0_2: śikṣiṣye yāvan nāham anyān bhikṣūn prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān
V05prmosufu:pay.75_1: / ājñātukāmena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pay.76_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ viharatāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam
V05prmosufu:pay.76_0_1: āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm aupaśrutikayā tiṣṭhed yad ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti tad ahaṃ śrutvā
V05prmosufu:pay.76_0_2: tathā tathānuvyahariṣyāmīty etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.77_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghasya dharmyāyāṃ viniścayakathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.80_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:58_0: uddānam* sabhojane 'ruṇe dānīṃ sūcīgṛhakapādakāḥ nahyān niṣadanaṃ kaṇḍū śāṭī sugatacīvaraṃ // ṛ //
V05prmosufu:pay.81_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhojane kule upanimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta santaṃ gṛhiṇam anavalokyānyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
V05prmosufu:pay.82_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anirgatāyāṃ rajanyām anudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu vā ratnasaṃmateṣu vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyaindrakīlaṃ vā indrakīlasāmantakaṃ vā samabhiḥ
V05prmosufu:61_0: Pay.Schl. pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // //
V05prmosufu:62_0: uddānam // grāmam antargṛhaṃ caiva śaikṣāṇy āraṇyakena ca prātideśyāni coktāni buddhena hitavādinā /
V05prmosufu:63_0: ime punar āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_0: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyā bhikṣuṇyā rathyāgatāyā grāmaṃ piṇḍāya carantyā antikāt
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_1: svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahir ārāmaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_2: gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyam garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.1_0_3: pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayaṃ dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_0: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ kuleṣūpanimantritā bhuṃja tatra ced bhikṣuṇī vyapadiśati
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_1: sthitā syād iha khādyakaṃ dehi iha odanaṃ dehi iha sūpikaṃ dehi iha bhūyo dehīti
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_2: sā bhikṣuṇī tair bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyā āgamaya tāvat tvaṃ bhagini muhūrtaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_3: tūṣṇī yāvad ime bhikṣavo bhuṃjate ekabhikṣor api cen na pratibhāyantāṃ bhikṣuṇīm
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_4: evaṃ vaktuṃ sarvais tair bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīya bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām
V05prmosufu:pratid.2_0_5: antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyaṃ vayam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannā āsātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_0: yāni tāni saṃghasya śaikṣāṇi kulāni bhavanti śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmatāni /
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_0: / yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasya śaikṣeṣu kuleṣu śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmateṣu pūrvam
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_1: apravāritaḥ san upasaṃkramya svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded bhuṃjīta
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_2: vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahir ārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam asmy
V05prmosufu:pratid.3_1_3: āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy ayam
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_0: yāni tāni saṃghasyāraṇyakāni śayanāsanāni bhavanti sāśaṃkasaṃmatāni sabhayasaṃmatāni sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmatāni /
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_0: / yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasyāraṇyakeṣu śayanāsaneṣu sāśaṃkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_1: sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu sarvam apratisaṃvidite vane bahir ārāmasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_2: pratigṛhyānte ārāmasya khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ
V05prmosufu:pratid.4_1_3: garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmy
V05prmosufu:68_0_0: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmās tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi
V05prmosufu:68_0_1: kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
V05prmosufu:68_0_2: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05prmosufu:69_0: uddānaṃ // nivāsanena sapta syus trayaś copari cīvare saṃvṛtodguṇṭhikollaṃghikayā kāyena + + + /
V05prmosufu:70_0: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti //
V05prmosufu:sai.1_0: parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.2-7_0: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ na tālavṛndakaṃ na kulmāṣapiṇḍakaṃ na nāgaśīrṣakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.8_0: parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.9-10_0: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.11-15_0: susaṃvṛtā supraticchannā alpaśabdā anutkṣiptacakṣuṣo yugamātradarśino 'ntargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.16-20_0: nodguṇṭhikā notkṛṣṭikayā notsaktikayā na vyastikayā na paryastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.21-25_0: nollaṃghikayā nojjaṃghikayā notkuṭukikayā na nikuṭotkuṭukikayā na khaṃbhākṛtā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.26-30_0: na kāyapracālakaṃ na bāhupracālakaṃ na śīrṣapracālakaṃ nāṃsotḍhaukikayā na hastasaṃlagnikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:79_0: uddānaṃ kuryān na viniṣatsyāmīty aṣṭau cāpi pratigrahe paṃca catus sapta paṃca satkṛtyādi tu bhojane /
V05prmosufu:sai.31_0: nānanujñātā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.32-39_0_0: nāpratyavekṣyāsanaṃ sarvakāyaṃ samavadhāya na pāde pādam ādhāya na gulphe gulpham
V05prmosufu:sai.32-39_0_1: ādhāya na sakthani sakthi ādhāya na saṃkṣipya pādau na vikṣipya pādau na viḍaṃgikayā
V05prmosufu:sai.32-39_0_2: antargṛha āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V05prmosufu:sai.40_0: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā //
V05prmosufu:sai.41-43_0: na samatittikaṃ samasūpikaṃ sāvadānaṃ pātrasaṃjñinaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
